thread.title: Gun-toting woman in slippers who allegedly robbed Portland deli sought by police
thread.title_full: Gun-toting woman in slippers who allegedly robbed Portland deli sought by police | OregonLive.com

author: Everton Bailey Jr. | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Gun-toting woman in slippers who allegedly robbed Portland deli sought by police
text:
Portland police say a woman fled with cash from a North Portland deli after flashing a gun and demanding money from an employee on Thursday.
The robbery was reported around 2 p.m. at Lotos Deli, 3611 Northeast 82nd Avenue . The woman is described as appearing in her 30s or 40s with a heavy build and was wearing dark-colored clothes and slippers.
Police ask anyone with information to call robbery detectives at 503-823-0405.
-- Everton Bailey Jr.
ebailey@oregonian.com
503-221-8343; @EvertonBailey
